title: Emerald Drop Diamond Haaram: The 'Aabharana Vanamali'
materials: 18K Yellow Gold. Features a captivating Pear-shaped Emerald with Excellent Clarity
accented by meticulously set Brilliant-cut Diamonds. The gold has a subtle Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This Haaram showcases a modern take on traditional floral motifs. The delicate vine-like design is encrusted with diamonds, leading to a stunning emerald pendant. The pendant features a halo setting, accentuating the emerald's vibrant green hue. The diamond settings are designed to maximize brilliance, creating a dazzling effect. Showcases contemporary design with a nod to traditional 'Moggu' designs.
colors: with a striking emerald green centerpiece. The contrast creates a visually appealing and luxurious aesthetic.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special occasions. Suitable for grand receptions and contemporary weddings
and also pairs wonderfully with traditional Indian attire for a sophisticated look.
description: This Diamond Haaram balances modern aesthetics with timeless elegance. The emerald is a symbol of prosperity and growth, while the diamonds represent eternal love and commitment. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this piece is a true heirloom that can be passed down through generations. The exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure both beauty and durability.
